features: NONSTICK-Wodiilo frying pan gives you more confidence when creating the dishes you love. Our cookware require less oil or butter for cooking and minimal scrubbing for a spotless clean. We make cookware that give you a healthier and easy at home culinary experience.
COOK HEALTHIER-Our nonstick skillet is made of eco-friendly material.The frying pan is free of PFOS/PFOA, our cookware ensures your daily cooking is always safer and healthier.

SAFE COATING-Our cast aluminum induction cookware is health and safe to use for your everyday cooking. Cookware without the chemicals that can be used as a skillet or non stick frying pan, with superb food release and easy cleanup.Dishwasher safe.Hand wash recommended to maintain the nonstick finish.
HARD-ANODIZED EXTERIOR-This non stick cookware has an extremely durable shot-blasted, hard-anodized exterior that resists scratches like stainless steel.
ERGONOMICAL DESIGN: Stainless-steel handle is ergonomically designed for comfort and double-riveted for strength and maneuverability.

INDUCTION COMPATIBLE-With a magnetic base that facilitates even heat distribution, our cookware is suitable for use on all types of cooktops, including induction, ensuring a versatile and efficient cooking experience.

100% SATISFICATIOPN AFTER SERVICE-Our frying omelette Pan is backed by superior quality assurance for confident purchase. We wish our customer to be 100% happy. If you have any problem about the kitchen cookware, please feel free to contact us, we're always here for you. Do not hesitate! Try it risk-free now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight and nonstick
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this pan off and on for the past month and it's been working great! It's on the smaller side, but perfect when I'm making something for just the kids or just for myself. I've made eggs, spaghetti sauce, chicken and all sorts of things in there and it's come clean right away no problem each time! It's very lightweight, which, at first, I thought I was going to hate, and feared it wouldn't heat well, but for this size, it's actually heated very evenly and performed very well. If you are looking for a small non-stick pan, this will definitely do!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An everyday pan
reviews.reviewText: Knocking a star off because the handle looks like it was spray painted and even after many washes, it has a slight paint smell. The pan itself works great and makes a all-purpose basic pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this pan everyday and it is very very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great skillet, works as it should
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice skillet. Oven safe and dishwasher safe. Not sure how long the non stick coating will last over time but early on this is serving its purpose. It's not Hexclad or Calphalon quality but it will work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, deep sauté pan
reviews.reviewText: The high sides are great if you're looking to do more than just fry eggs. I love using this pan to sear over high heat and then finish off in the oven. The non-stick coating is pretty good and cleans nicely. I still use a little oil when I cook regardless of how amazing they tell you the pan is. I really like the size of this pan. It's great if you're cooking for 1 or 2. It's on the small side at 9 inches, but it's very manageable and not too big if you're making a small meal for 2. Hopefully the non-stick coating holds up for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, not great
reviews.reviewText: So, this is a nice little pan. Handle is very nice, and the bottom of the pan is a nice, sturdy design. That said, there are a couple of issues. First, the coating seems to be coming off. I cant tell for sure, because I cant actually see any spots where it seems the coating is chipping or anything, but there are randomly little black flakes in my food sometimes. I know the obvious answer is that its simply whatever im cooking being burned a little, but this isnt the case. It is clearly some sort of non-stick coating that is coming off, I just cant tell where or how. Additionally, the pan seems to be a touch ill-designed. What i mean by that is that its not balanced properly. When I put it on the burner to heat it up, the handle is heavier than the empty pan, so it will randomly tip over. Once I have stuff in the pan, this isnt an issue, but I have never seen a pan do this before. Overall, I dont think I would get this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Made an omelet and that egg flipped without any problem even got some of the cheese in the pan and that slid right on out with the egg not a problem at all.The second attempt didn't go so well but that was user issue lol tried to flip the egg too soon and end up with scrambled eggs instead which was fine as I could easily add cheese to it without worry of it sticking in the pan.The pan works great as a frying pan though it is deep enough to use it as a shallow sauce pan.I like that it can go from the stove to the oven so you could brown up some meat and then do a one pot baked spaghetti in the oven all in the same pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our Breakfast Pan
reviews.reviewText: We like this pan a lot. We use it for breakfast, to make eggs, bacon, sausage, breakfast sandwiches. The non -stick coating is impressive; we've had zero sticking issues. It's easy to clean. I use one single wet paper towel and wipe and then dry with a dish towel. I will wash with soap sparingly. We do have some scratches on the bottom, however, that is due to family members using metal utensils in the pan, which is not recommended nor safe.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great size for one or two people.
reviews.reviewText: I use it for anything that I want to fry, and it works great with my induction cooktop.
